name: Surbird
description:
In Surbird, players take on the role of a powerful wizard tasked with defending a besieged village from a vicious horde of devils. When devils attack the town, its terrified inhabitants seek refuge in their homes, leaving the fate of the village in the hands of a wizard.
To protect the villagers, the wizard must strategically create and enhance clusters of magical energy known as Crystals. These ethereal constructs act as automatic defenses, launching powerful magical projectiles at invading enemies.



Control the hero using the keyboard.
Upgrade crystals by left-clicking on the icon of the desired crystal and select the desired item for improvement.
As players progress through the game, they can increase their wizard's health and unlock powerful spells to wreak havoc on their enemies.
The opportunity to improve your character or get a new crystal is given each new level to choose from.



Each successful defense not only ensures the safety of the village, but also contributes to the history of the wizards' heroic deeds, demonstrating their valor and resilience in the face of overwhelming odds.
Surbird offers an exciting combination of strategy, action and magic, challenging players to use their arcane abilities and protect the innocent from the forces of darkness. Can you rise to the occasion and become the savior of the village, or will the devils prevail in their merciless attack? The choice is yours in this epic story of a mystical war.
